#include<stdio.h>

long long int num[2000001];

int main()
{
    int tc;
    long int n,i;
    long long int m,first,second,curr;
    scanf("%d",&tc);

    while(tc--)
    {
        scanf("%ld%lld",&n,&m);

        if(n == 1)
        {
            printf("1/1\n");
            continue;
        }
        first = 0;second = 1;
        for(i=0;i<=2*n;i++)
        {
            num[i] = (first+second)%m;
            first = second;
            second = num[i];
        }
        /*for(i=0;i<=2*n;++i)
            printf("%lld ",num[i]);
        printf("\n");*/
        printf("%lld/%lld\n",num[2*n-3],num[2*n-2]);
    }
    return 0;
}
